thread.title: Watch Tom Brady join Gronk and Marshawn Lynch on Conan's 'Clueless Gamer'
thread.title_full: Watch Tom Brady join Gronk and Marshawn Lynch on Conan's 'Clueless Gamer'

author: Hayden Bird
title: Watch Tom Brady join Gronk and Marshawn Lynch on Conan's 'Clueless Gamer'
text:
Watch Tom Brady join Gronk and Marshawn Lynch on Conan’s ‘Clueless Gamer’ Watch Tom Brady join Gronk and Marshawn Lynch on Conan’s ‘Clueless Gamer’ "Tom Brady is about to get what might be the most important award of his life." By Hayden Bird 8:18 AM 
Get Patriots game stats and the inside scoop on the season with The Boston Globe's Point After newsletter delivered for free to your inbox. 
It’s becoming a tradition unlike any other. 
Every year at the Super Bowl, Conan O’Brien unleashes a special edition of a regular segment on his late night show called “Clueless Gamer”. Two years ago, O’Brien invited Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski and Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch . This year, he gathered players from both the Patriots and Falcons to play a random video game. 
In 2017’s edition, O’Brien had Patriots quarterback Tom Brady and Falcons defensive end Dwight Freeney as his main guests, but couldn’t resist the urge to bring Gronkowski and even Lynch back again. Patriots running back LeGarrette Blount also joined. 
Here’s the full segment, in which O’Brien compares his Boston celebrity status to Brady’s: Advertisement
